summary:
Collaborative leader and scientist with passion to bring  innovative products that improve health outcomes for patients . Several years of  global experience in program  leadership, strategic and scientific planning of   clinical programs and regulatory submissions.

As the former Global Head of Scientific Patient Engagement (PE) at Novartis , drove the PE strategy, performance, operational quality, and innovative design; to ensure implementation, and delivery across therapeutic areas in Global Drug Development.

Therapeutic experience  in Oncology& Hematology, Oral Mucosistis, Gastric Disorders, Asthma and COPD , Migraine, Multiple Sclerosis, Alzheimer Dementia, Hypertention, Pain,  Vaccines and Telemedicine.
